attributes.action: Ensure UK POLICE administer, UK LAW against ALL FACTIONS without Favour
attributes.additional_details: Recent demonstrations in LUTON, LONDON, BIRMINGHAM
attributes.background: It is apparent that the British Police and authorities Favour some factions and religions over others

rejection.details:
In any case, complaints about the Police are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament, but is an issue for the Independent Police Complaints Commission:

https://www.ipcc.gov.uk/
